```{r set-up, include=FALSE}
# Packages
library(here)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
# Settings
knitr::opts_chunk$set(eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, 
                      message = FALSE, warning = FALSE,
                      eval.after = "fig.cap")
theme_set(theme_bw())
round <- 0
origin_date <- as.Date("2022-03-13") 

# Load results
models <- list.dirs(here("data-processed"), full.names = FALSE)
models <- models[grepl(".", models)]
results <- map2_dfr(.x = models, .y = origin_date,
                    ~ read_csv(here("data-processed", .x,
                                    paste0(.y, "-", .x, ".csv"))) %>%
                      mutate(model = .x))
```
